Major crack(s) on the pole,

Bent Pole,
Significantly leaning pole,
Exposed wire,
Pole footing compromised (nuts/bolts properly tightened or rusted).
....................................................
Poor Pole Condition -
 Corrosion including chipped or peeling paint on the pole,
Minor cracks(s) on the pole,
Some rebar exposed indicating minor physical damage to the pole ,
Slight bent or leaning of the pole, 
Excessive surface wear observed, 
Minor pole footing issues that do not compromised the poles structural integrity (nuts/bolts properly tightened or rusted?)
...............................................................................
